'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Quest item }} in {{poe2}}. It is part of a pair, of which the [Cornett of Waves](/cornettOfWaves/) is the other, and was lost when the [Old City](/oldCity/) sank.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}
